name: Kernel cooperve
body:
Model: _GT-S5830C-i-M_

CPU: _Broadcom 21553 ARM11_

Arquitecture: _ARM1136JF-S_


![Rafael.Baugis Kernel](http://forum.xda-developers.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=1346508&stc=1&d=1348352950)


This Kernel version 2.6.35.7 is from Samsung sources, with GCC 4.4.7 compiled from sources, specific to arm1136jf-s.
I changed in sources for add more frequencies to cpu and configured to add features.
The kernel can be used on any rom.


### kernel features:
* vfat, ext2, ext3, ext4.
* swap, ramzswap and zRAM.
* cpu freq with auto undervolt.
 1. 156Mhz 1,18v
 2. 312Mhz 1,24v
 3. 624Mhz 1,30v
 4. 832Mhz 1,36v
* cpu auto undervolt on change cpu freq.
* cpu governors smartassV2, lazy, lulzactive, minmax, lagfree, lionheart, conservative, interactive, ondemand, ondemandx, userspace, powersave, bcm21553 and performance.
* IO schedulers noop, deadline, cfq, sio, vr and bfq.
* iptables full needed rules.
* vpn support
* cifs support
* init.d - if not work check if the su and busybox location is /system/xbin/


### How to Compile:
1. Install dependencies.
 * $ ./install_dep.sh
2. Configure and Compile.
 * $ ./Compile.sh
3. Create package.
 * $ ./Creat_package.sh
